manage.teamColorHint: Set a custom colour for this team. It will appear on team circles in diagrams.

colorValidation.saturation: Colour is too grey. Choose a more vivid colour (saturation must be at least 30%).
colorValidation.lightness: Colour is too dark or too bright. Choose a mid-range colour (lightness must be between 25% and 75%).

createRole.title: Create a new role
createRole.assignHint: If not specified, the role will be assigned to the team leader
createRole.missionPlaceholder: What is this role responsible for?

roleManage.deleteRoleWarning: Deleting this role will remove it from the team and unassign the current member. This action will be recorded in the decision journal and cannot be undone.
roleManage.createTeam: Create a team from this role
roleManage.createTeamDescription: Transform this role into the leader of a new team. The team will inherit the role's name.
roleManage.createTeamBullet2: Convert this role into the team's leader
roleManage.createTeamBullet3: Assign you as the team's secretary and referee
roleManage.createTeamDecisionNote: This action will be recorded in the decision journal.
roleManage.reassignConfirmDescription: You are about to change who holds this role. This cannot be undone directly.
roleManage.reassignBullet1: {{currentMember}} will be unassigned from this role
roleManage.reassignBullet2: {{newMember}} will take over the role and its responsibilities
roleManage.reassignBullet3: This change will be recorded in the decision journal

diagram.noRolesYetDescription: This team has no roles defined. Create your first role to see it here.
diagram.noTeamsYetDescription: Create your first team to start mapping your organization structure.
diagram.roleNotFoundDescription: This role may have been deleted or moved.
diagram.teamStructureAriaLabel: Team structure diagram for {{name}} showing {{count}} roles
diagram.orgStructureDesc: Interactive diagram showing {{count}} teams and their relationships. Use Tab to navigate between teams, Enter to select.
diagram.assignedToMember: Assigned to {{name}}. Click to view member details.
diagram.belongsToTeam: Belongs to team {{name}}. Click to navigate to team view.
diagram.srRoleViewAnnouncement: Now viewing role: {{title}}. Press Escape to return to team view.
diagram.srRoleViewTeamHint: Press T to navigate to team {{name}}.
diagram.srRoleViewSourceHint: Press L to navigate to source role.
diagram.srRoleViewMemberHint: Press M to navigate to the assigned member.
